title: ReplyWithHeader Mail Plugin/Bundle's Latest Changelog

latest.title: Version 5.4-beta (1 enhancements)
latest.releaseNotes:
Version 5.4-beta (1 enhancements)
  • Added support for OS High Sierra 10.13 (Functionality works, however RWH preference UI cuts off; need to work on)
  • Partially addressed the Outlook Reply All behavior.
